## Learning Resources

### Courses & Tutorials

- [DeepLearning.AI — Generative AI for Everyone](https://www.deeplearning.ai/courses/generative-ai-for-everyone/) — Excellent intro course by Andrew Ng
- [Google — Generative AI Learning Path](https://cloud.google.com/training/machinelearning-ai) — Comprehensive Google Cloud training
- [Prompt Engineering Guide](https://www.promptingguide.ai/) — Community resource for prompting techniques

## Tools & Platforms

### Conversational AI

- [ChatGPT](https://chat.openai.com) — OpenAI's flagship interface
- [Claude](https://claude.ai) — Anthropic's assistant
- [Gemini](https://gemini.google.com) — Google's AI assistant
- [Perplexity](https://perplexity.ai) — AI-powered search

### Development Tools

- [GitHub Copilot](https://github.com/features/copilot) — AI pair programmer
- [Cursor](https://cursor.sh) — AI-first code editor
- [Replit](https://replit.com) — AI-assisted coding platform

### Image Generation

- [Midjourney](https://midjourney.com) — High-quality image generation
- [DALL-E](https://openai.com/dall-e-3) — OpenAI's image model
- [Stable Diffusion](https://stability.ai) — Open-source image generation

## Research & News

### Stay Updated

- [The Batch](https://www.deeplearning.ai/the-batch/) — Weekly AI newsletter by DeepLearning.AI
- [Import AI](https://jack-clark.net/) — Weekly AI developments newsletter
- [AI News](https://buttondown.email/ainews) — Daily AI news digest
